body: The are many Geth nodes on Görli and the EF signer is also Geth. They seem to be working just fine.
We can try to do a full sync from scratch to see if something got broken on master. Did your node crash by any chance lately? Was is shut down uncleanly? Do you have some startup logs to share?
There were unclean shutdowns, yes. Quite possible that my DB is corrupted. I'll resync from scratch and let you know if I see the error(s) again.

pressing thumbs for sucessful resyncing!
we are running again

25800
